modName: Celtic bodypaint for males and females
summary: This lore-friendly texture replacer will add celtic bodypaint to your character.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1170.photobucket.com/albums/r540/orangebirdgaming/f1a7356a.png[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i1170.photobucket.com/albums/r540/orangebirdgaming/37252a76.png[/IMG]
=================
Description:
=================


This file replaces the malebody_1.dds/femalebody_1.dds so that it will look like celtic warpaint,
I reccomend using it on your custom race becouse otherwise every nord person in the game uses this skin.
I thought i would add some celtic skin becouse i wanted a bit of nordic/viking style skin, and i heard that people wanted to see some celtic warpaint.

The coming weeks, i will continue making new designs and other warpaint\'s in Celtic/viking style.
it could take some time but more will follow! 

===Feel free to share idea\'s!===

=================
Installation:
=================
Just drop the file; femalebody_1.dds to your custom race. 
OR into Data-textures- actors- character- female (not reccomended becouse all females will have this texture)


(male)
Just drop the file; malebody_1.dds to your custom race. 

OR into Data-textures- actors- character- male (not reccomended becouse all males will have this texture)

=================
Uninstallation:
=================

Remove the malebody_1.dds or femalebody_1.dds file from the custom race map

=================

[IMG]http://i1170.photobucket.com/albums/r540/orangebirdgaming/a5680df8.png[/IMG]
author: thepelgrim
